trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when an unrecognized HRESULT is returned from a COM method call.
trans-unit.target: 当 COM 方法调用返回一个无法识别的 HRESULT 时引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: The common language runtime transforms well-known HRESULTs to .NET Framework exceptions, enabling COM objects to return meaningful error information to managed clients.
trans-unit.target: 公共语言运行时的已知将 HRESULTs 转换成.NET Framework 异常，使 COM 对象能够将有意义的错误信息返回托管客户端。

trans-unit.source: The HRESULT to exception mapping also works in the other direction by returning specific HRESULTs to unmanaged clients.
trans-unit.target: 异常的映射到 HRESULT 还其他可以反向工作，即将特定的 Hresult 返回到非托管客户端。

trans-unit.source: For mapping details, see [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关映射的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 映射 Hresult 和异常](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md)。

trans-unit.source: When the runtime encounters an unfamiliar HRESULT (an HRESULT that lacks a specific, corresponding exception), it throws an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException> class.
trans-unit.target: 当运行时遇到不熟悉的 HRESULT (缺少特定的相应异常的 HRESULT) 时，则它引发的实例<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException>类。

trans-unit.source: This all-purpose exception exposes the same members as any exception, and inherits a public <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException.ErrorCode%2A> property that contains the HRESULT returned by the callee.
trans-unit.target: 此通用异常公开相同的成员的任何异常，并继承公共<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException.ErrorCode%2A>由被调用方返回包含 HRESULT 的属性。

trans-unit.source: If an error message is available to the runtime (obtained from the [IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms723041\(v=vs.85\).aspx) interface or the `Err` object in Visual Basic, or in some cases from the operating system), the message is returned to the caller.
trans-unit.target: 如果一条错误消息可供运行时 (通过[IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms723041\(v=vs.85\).aspx)接口或`Err`对象在 Visual Basic 中，或在某些情况下从操作系统)，消息返回到调用方。

trans-unit.source: However, if the COM component developer fails to include an error message, the runtime returns the eight-digit HRESULT in place of a message string.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果 COM 组件开发人员未能包含错误信息，则运行时返回八位数的 HRESULT 代替消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: Having an HRESULT allows the caller to determine the cause of the generic exception.
trans-unit.target: 拥有 HRESULT 使调用方确定一般异常的原因。

trans-unit.source: Handling a COMException exception
trans-unit.target: 处理 COMException 异常

trans-unit.source: The following are some considerations for troubleshooting a <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 以下是一些注意事项疑难解答<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException>异常。

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException.ErrorCode%2A> property
trans-unit.target: 检查<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException.ErrorCode%2A>属性

trans-unit.source: When the runtime encounters an unfamiliar HRESULT and throws a <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException> exception, the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException.ErrorCode%2A> property includes either the error message or, if an error message is unavailable, the eight-digit HRESULT value.
trans-unit.target: 当运行时遇到不熟悉的 HRESULT，并引发<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException>异常，<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException.ErrorCode%2A>属性包括错误消息或者，如果一条错误消息不可用，八位数的 HRESULT 值。

trans-unit.source: The error message or the HRESULT value can help you determine the cause of the exception.
trans-unit.target: 错误消息或 HRESULT 值可帮助你确定异常的原因。

trans-unit.source: For a list of HRESULT values, see [Common HRESULT Values](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/aa378137\(v=vs.85\).aspx).
trans-unit.target: HRESULT 值的列表，请参阅[常见的 HRESULT 值](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/aa378137\(v=vs.85\).aspx)。

trans-unit.source: Late-bound arguments and Microsoft Office objects
trans-unit.target: 后期绑定自变量和 Microsoft Office 对象

trans-unit.source: When passing late-bound arguments to methods of Microsoft Office objects, a <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException> exception may be thrown when the objects are COM objects.
trans-unit.target: 将后期绑定自变量传递给方法的 Microsoft Office 对象，<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException>当这些对象是 COM 对象，可能会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The late binder assumes that such method calls involve a `ByRef` parameter and that the property you pass has a `set` accessor.
trans-unit.target: 后期联编程序假定：此类方法调用涉及 `ByRef` 参数，并且所传递的属性具有 `set` 访问器。

trans-unit.source: If the property does not, the .NET Framework generates a <xref:System.MissingMethodException> exception (with a `CORE_E_MISSINGMETHOD` HRESULT ).
trans-unit.target: 如果相应属性不，.NET Framework 生成<xref:System.MissingMethodException>异常 (与`CORE_E_MISSINGMETHOD`HRESULT)。

trans-unit.source: To work around this behavior, use early-bound objects or pass a variable instead of a property of the object.
trans-unit.target: 要处理此行为，请使用早期绑定对象或传递变量而不是对象的属性。

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio and the hosting process
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio 和宿主进程

trans-unit.source: COM is used to communicate between Visual Studio and the [hosting process](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms185331.aspx).
trans-unit.target: COM 用于 Visual Studio 之间进行通信和[承载进程](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms185331.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: Because it is used before code runs, a call to [CoInitializeSecurity](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms693736\(v=vs.85\).aspx) causes this exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 因为它在代码运行，调用前使用[CoInitializeSecurity](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms693736\(v=vs.85\).aspx)导致引发此异常。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, running Visual Studio as Administrator may resolve the issue.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，以管理员身份运行 Visual Studio 可能解决问题。

trans-unit.source: You can also [disable the hosting process](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms185330.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 你还可以[禁用宿主进程](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms185330.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: Throwing a COMException exception
trans-unit.target: 引发 COMException 异常

trans-unit.source: Although you can use the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException> class to return specific HRESULTs to unmanaged clients, throwing a specific .NET Framework exception is better than using a generic exception.
trans-unit.target: 尽管可以使用<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException>类特定的 Hresult 返回到非托管客户端，引发了特定的.NET Framework 异常优于使用一般异常。

trans-unit.source: Consider that managed clients as well as unmanaged clients can use your .NET Framework object, and throwing an HRESULT to a managed caller is less comprehensible than throwing an exception.
trans-unit.target: 请考虑托管客户端，以及非托管客户端可以使用你的.NET Framework 对象，并向托管调用方引发 HRESULT 是不太易于理解比引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException" /> class with default values.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认值初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException> inherits from <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException> 继承自 <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException>。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows how this constructor sets the properties of the <xref:System.Exception> object.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示如何此构造函数设置的属性<xref:System.Exception>对象。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
`null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: A localized error message string.
trans-unit.target: 本地化的错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: The message that indicates the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 指示异常原因的消息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException" /> class with a specified message.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的消息初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException> inherits from <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException> 继承自 <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException>。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows how this constructor sets the properties of the <xref:System.Exception> object.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示如何此构造函数设置的属性<xref:System.Exception>对象。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 承载序列化对象数据的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> object that supplies the contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关源或目标的上下文信息的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException" /> class from serialization data.
trans-unit.target: 从序列化数据初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数在反序列化过程中调用，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException> inherits from <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException> 继承自 <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="info" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="info" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>inner</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>inner</c> 参数不为 <see langword="null" />，则当前异常会在处理内部异常的 <see langword="catch" /> 块中引发。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性返回的值与传递到构造函数中的值相同；或者，如果 `null` 属性没有向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows how this constructor sets the properties of the <xref:System.Exception> object.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示如何此构造函数设置的属性<xref:System.Exception>对象。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
The inner exception reference.
trans-unit.target: 内部异常引用。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: The message that indicates the reason the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: 指示所发生异常的原因的消息。

trans-unit.source: The error code (HRESULT) value associated with this exception.
trans-unit.target: 与该异常关联的错误代码 (HRESULT) 值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException" /> class with a specified message and error code.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的消息和错误代码初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException> constructor sets the base message with the error code.
trans-unit.target: 这<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException>构造函数设置并提供错误代码的基本消息。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException> inherits from <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException> 继承自 <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException>。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows how this constructor sets the properties of the <xref:System.Exception> object.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示如何此构造函数设置的属性<xref:System.Exception>对象。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
Converts the contents of the exception to a string.
trans-unit.target: 将异常的内容转换为字符串。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the <see cref="P:System.Exception.HResult" />, <see cref="P:System.Exception.Message" />, <see cref="P:System.Exception.InnerException" />, and <see cref="P:System.Exception.StackTrace" /> properties of the exception.
trans-unit.target: 包含异常的 <see cref="P:System.Exception.HResult" />、<see cref="P:System.Exception.Message" />、<see cref="P:System.Exception.InnerException" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Exception.StackTrace" /> 属性的字符串。
